Text: A Tree Full of Secretes is a fine example of Floyd minuatae.  A must for the Floyd Fan.

Bitrate is zero.one, stupidfuck. Get a life: lotr1950 offers us a beautiful torrent, which we all will get for free, but some stupid uses MUST have a certain bitrate or whatever - otherwise they'll complain. What's more important, the content/the actual albums or the bitrate? Thanks for all the great stuff you put out, lotr1950, fast downloads and good quality - no complaints from me at all.
